p: Magnolia citrata is listed under the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) Red List criteria as Least Concern (LC) category [ 30]. To avoid extinction and to conserve M. citrata in Vietnam, MCEO composition has been poorly explored despite its distinctive odor [ 31]. The existing literature showed that MCEO was rich in linalool, citronellal, and citral isomers (neral and geranial) [ 32], which corresponds with our results.
